Four Factor Team Histories

Source: R/cbd_torvik_team_history.R
cbd_torvik_team_history.Rd

Returns a tibble with four factor team his

Usage

cbd_torvik_team_history(team)

Arguments

team

team

Value

Returns a tibble with four factor history.

Examples

try(cbd_torvik_team_history(team = 'Duke'))
#> # A tibble: 18 × 23
